殽字的基本解释

殽
xiáo
同“淆”。

殽
yáo
古同“肴”。

殽
xiào
古同“效”，效法。

殽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiáo］
［《廣韻》胡茅切，平肴，匣。］
错杂；混杂。
[②]［yáo］
［《廣韻》胡茅切，平肴，匣。］
(1)通“肴”。带骨的熟肉。
(2)通“肴”。泛指菜肴。
(3)通“肴”。吃；食用。
(4)同“崤”。古地名。古代九塞之一。
[③]［xiào］
［《集韻》後教切，去效，匣。］
通“效1”。
(1)效法。
(2)效果；征验。

殽字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　殽； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页586第06
【唐韻】胡茅切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】何交切，?音爻。【說文】相雜錯也。【前漢·食貨志】鑄作錢布皆用銅，殽以連錫。【註】連，錫之別名。謂以連與錫，雜銅而爲錢也。　又亂也。與淆同。【前漢·董仲舒傳】賢不肖混殽。【陳遵傳】作溷殽，義同。　又豆食也。與肴同。【詩·小雅】殽核維旅。【毛傳】殽，豆實也。【鄭箋】豆實，葅醢也。凡非穀而食之曰殽。【周禮·天官】醢人掌四豆之實，韭葅醯醢之等，皆實之於豆。　又俎實也。【詩·大雅】爾殽旣將。【鄭箋】殽，謂牲體也。正義曰：歸俎者，以牲體實之於俎，故謂之俎實。　又肉帶骨曰殽。【禮·曲禮】左殽右胾。【註】殽，骨體也。殽在俎，胾在豆。【疏】熟肉有骨俎。　又地名。亦山名。與崤同。【春秋·僖三十三年】晉敗秦師于殽。【杜預註】殽，在弘農澠池縣西。本又作崤。【地理通釋】《呂氏春秋》九塞，殽其一也。《春秋正義》云：俗呼爲土殽、石殽，其阨道在兩殽之閒。【史記·封禪書】自殽以東，名山五。【註】殽，戸交反，亦音豪。　又【集韻】胡刀切，音豪。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiáo］
["Guangyun" Hu Mao cut, flat dish, box. ]
Miscellaneous; miscellaneous.
[②]［yáo］
["Guangyun" Hu Mao cut, flat dish, box. ]
(1) Through "dish". Bone-in cooked meat.
(2) Through "dish". Refers to dishes in general.
(3) Through "dish". Eat
(4) Same as "崤". Ancient place names. One of the ancient nine plugs.
[③]［xiào］
[After "Jiyun" teaches cutting, to effect, box. ]
Pass "Effect 1".
(1) Follow the example.
(2) Effect; levy.
Confuse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Fanzi Department] 　 confuse; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 586 06
[Tang Yun] Hu Maoqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] What cross-cutting? Sound line. [Said the text] Miscellaneous. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Copper is used for casting money cloth, and even tin is mixed. [Note] Lian, an alias for tin. It is said that Yilian and tin are mixed with copper for money.　It's messy again. Same with confusion. [Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] Confusion between the wise and the shameless. [Chen Zun Chuan] Confusion, meaning the same.　It's also bean food. Same as food. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Obfuscate the nuclear maintenance brigade. [Mao Chuan] Confusion, the beans are also real. [Zheng Jian] Beans are real, and glutinous rice is also. Anything that is not grain but eats is said to be confused. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】The four beans in the hands of the people, and the scallops and scorpions, are all in the beans.　 It's true again. [Poetry·Daya] You confused the general. [Zheng Jian] Confused, it means that the animal body is also. Justice said: Those who belong to you, the animal body is real to you, so it is called real.　The meat and the bones are said to be confused. 【Li·Chu Li】Left confused and right subordinate. [Note] Confusion, bones are also. Confusion is in Cu, and sub is in beans. 【Sparse】Cooked meat has bones.　Also place name. Yishan name. Same as 崤. [Chunqiu·Xi Thirty Years] Jin defeated Qin Shiyu. [Du pre-note] Obfuscation, in the west of Mianchi County, Hongnong. This is also made for 崤. [Explanation of Geography] "Lü Shi Chun Qiu" has nine plugs, which is one of them. "Spring and Autumn Justice" says: It is commonly called soil confusion and stone confusion, and the evil way is between the two confusions. 【Historical Records·Feng Chan Shu】Eastern from confusion, famous mountain five. [Note] If you are confused, you will turn against each other, and you will have a good voice.　[Jiyun] Hu knife cut, Yinhao.

Name meaning
Nothing.
yáo, xiào
I гл.
1) yáo смешивать, перепутывать; смешанный, хаотичный, спутанный
用铜, 殽以连锡 сделать из меди, смешав её со свинцовой рудой
2) xiào * подражать, копировать, брать за образец
II yáo сущ.
вм. 肴 (рагу, мясная закуска)
III собств. yáo геогр.
(сокр. вм. 殽山) Яошань (гора в пров. Хэнань)
殽函гора Яошань и перевал Ханьгугуань
